title: Ep 9: No Dumb Questions
description:
Today's Proceedings: A cat owner who likes to talk dirty, a dog owner with relationship problems, a photographer with an "unconventionally attractive" girlfriend, and a friend buying lingerie.  We also discuss the greatest film event to ever exist, Hamilton, and reveal a new segment of "No Dumb Questions."


Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod  

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod  



Music by: James Young

 https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg  



Logo/Designs by: 

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
